name: Butter Chicken (Murgh Makhani)
steps: Prep: Chop onions, tomatoes, and prep spices for Butter Chicken (Murgh Makhani).
Heat oil/ghee; saut√© onions until golden. Add ginger-garlic paste.
Add tomatoes and spices; cook until the masala releases oil.
Add main ingredient and a splash of water; simmer until done.
Finish with coriander/cream/lemon; serve hot.
caption_en: Cook to Admire: Butter Chicken (Murgh Makhani) üçõ Bold flavors, simple steps. Save & try tonight! üáÆüá≥

Heat oil/ghee; saut√© onions until golden. Add ginger-garlic paste.
Add tomatoes and spices; cook until the masala releases oil.
